snippet.title: Advent NEON: C-SAGExpo 2023 Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
CHRISTMAS SAGExpo BEGINS FRIDAY DECEMBER 8th!

Happy Holidays! Here's a surprise new demo, available only on SFGHQ! You'll be able to play with Neon's new moveset and mechanics, and use a new festive color scheme along with them! Hope you all enjoy it!

PLAY THE NEW DEMO: https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/advent-neon-demo-christmas-sage-2023.1986/
FOLLOW ADVENT NEON: https://twitter.com/AdventNeon
WISHLIST THE FULL GAME ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1528260/Advent_NEON/

*Note: This demo is NOT ON STEAM. Steam will get an updated demo next year. Consider this demo a predecessor to that one.
